name: Lonely Weapon 2D
description: Yeah, I'm using graphics taken from the Internet again. But what about the project? This is a 2d platformer with a level editor. I did it again on pygame, but I'm already starting to learn unity. You didn't appreciate the last game in any way, and it disappointed me, I wanted to quit it already, but I saw the first download and realized: For the sake of this person, I'm ready to continue doing this. And this is so I'm really looking forward to grades, even if they are bad, but I'm waiting
